ISSUE.TITLE: NameCompatibilityManager.AdditionalNameCompatibilities
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Not sure how it's used but it returns always an empty list ` public static List<Type> AdditionalNameCompatibilities => new List<Type>();` There is a reference in Initialize method Nop.Data.Mapping.NameCompatibilityManager `compatibilities.AddRange(AdditionalNameCompatibilities.Select(type => EngineContext.Current.ResolveUnregistered(type) as INameCompatibility));` and another in InitializePlugins method of Nop.Web.Framework.Infrastructure.Extensions `NameCompatibilityManager.AdditionalNameCompatibilities.AddRange(nameCompatibilityList);`

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #5171 Fixed inline edit issue "The value is not valid for seconds" (cherry picked from commit 53ce63fb0014b414f4f26427f961da0ba8d75b84)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5054 Fixed problem with the definition of AdditionalNameCompatibilities Property
#5054 Fixed problem with the definition of AdditionalNameCompatibilities Property (cherry picked from commit 6195c569d2f977880879c2dc46e1b16f13387b9c)
